What's Fixed in Version 1.6.1 - Stability Fixes

  • Fixed Parakeet crash - Resolved race condition between streaming and model cleanup
  • Fixed SwiftData crash - Added thread safety to transcription auto-cleanup
  • Install script - One-line installation now available

What's New in Version 1.6.0 - Transcription Architecture Fix

  • Last words no longer cut off - Complete audio is now transcribed at stop
  • 30-second chunking artifacts eliminated - Output from full audio, not timer-based chunks
  • Trailing Words Capture - Configurable delay (0-1500ms) after hotkey stop
  • Live preview is now UI-only - never used for actual output

What's New in Version 1.5.0 - Jarvis Voice Commands

  • Jarvis Command System - Say "Jarvis" + command to control transcription hands-free
  • "Jarvis send it" → Paste and send (hits Enter), keep recording
  • "Jarvis pause/listen" → Toggle command mode
  • "Jarvis go to Chrome" → Focus apps/tabs with local LLM navigation
  • Visual Timeline - Real-time log of transcriptions and commands
  • Smart scroll - stays at bottom unless you scroll up
  • Fixed duplicate commands with 3-second debounce

Optional: For navigation commands, install Ollama + llama3.2:3b

What's New in Version 1.4.0

  • Voice Commands - Say trigger phrases to control recording hands-free!
  • "send it" or "execute" → Stop, Paste & Send (hits Enter)
  • "stop recording" → Stop & Paste
  • User-configurable voice commands in Settings → Experimental Features
  • Improved window positioning - capsule appears consistently
  • Streaming preview polish: eyeball toggle, transparency controls, resizable

What's New in Version 1.3.0

  • Real-time streaming preview - see transcription as you speak!
  • Chat-bubble style UI with 1-second updates
  • 30-second chunk commits - bubbles lock in, nothing disappears
  • Parakeet V3 streaming support - fast and accurate
  • Toggle in Settings → Experimental Features

What's New in Version 1.2.0

  • Fixed word replacement regex for patterns ending in apostrophe
  • Added built-in fix that always converts I' to I'm
  • Word replacement now auto-enables when adding first entry
  • Fixed Release build error in VoiceActivityDetector
  • Removed "A voice for every village" tagline from About page

What's New in Version 1.1.0

  • Enhanced Mini Recorder Experience
  • Better spacing and window sizing
  • Persistent timer during transcription
  • Improved layout with centered status display
